text: He imanadaragana! Tomara sbiya uparjana theke ebam ya ami tomadera jan'ye bhumi theke utpanna karechi, ta theke utkrsta bastu byaya kara ebam ta theke nikrsta jinisa byaya karate manastha karo na. Kenana, ta tomara kakhana'o grahana karabe na; tabe yadi tomara cokha bandha kare niye na'o. Jene rekho, allaha abhaba mukta, prasansita.
